codesample:
%REM
The following code filters out values that are odd numbers
%END REM
Class EvenFilter as MapFilter
    Function filter(kvPair as Pair) as Boolean
        Dim value as Integer
        value = kvPair.value
        Return value Mod 2 = 0
    End Function
End Class
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim ef as New EvenFilter
Dim map2 as Map
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set map2 = map.filter(ef)
Print map2.elementCount
constructorsignature: Public Sub New(contentType As String, keyComparator As Comparator, isSorted As Boolean)
codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code filters out values that are odd numbers&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Class EvenFilter as MapFilter&lt;br /&gt;    Function filter(kvPair as Pair) as Boolean&lt;br /&gt;        Dim value as Integer&lt;br /&gt;        value = kvPair.value&lt;br /&gt;        Return value Mod 2 = 0&lt;br /&gt;    End Function&lt;br /&gt;End Class&lt;br /&gt;Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim ef as New EvenFilter&lt;br /&gt;Dim map2 as Map&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)&lt;br /&gt;Set map2 = map.filter(ef)&lt;br /&gt;Print map2.elementCount

methods.label: clone
methods.comment: Creates a clone of the Map.
methods.codesample:
Dim map1 as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim map2 as Map
Call map1.put(&quot;Hello&quot;,&quot;World&quot;)
Set map2 = map1.clone()
methods.signature: Public Function clone() As Map
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Creates a clone of the Map.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.label: collectKeys
methods.comment: Returns a clone of the keys in this Map.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code creates a Map of US state abbreviations and full names. If a list of only abbreviations is needed for another purpose, collectKeys() can be used to quickly get it.
%END REM
Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim coll as Collection
Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)
Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)
Set coll = map.collectKeys()
methods.signature: Public Function collectKeys() As Collection
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Returns a clone of the keys in this Map.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Returns a clone of the keys in this Map.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Returns a clone of the keys in this Map.
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code creates a Map of US state abbreviations and full names. If a list of only abbreviations is needed for another purpose, collectKeys() can be used to quickly get it.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim coll as Collection&lt;br /&gt;Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Set coll = map.collectKeys()

methods.label: collectValues
methods.comment: Loads the values from this Map into the passed Collection.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code creates a Map of US state abbreviations and full names. If a list of just state names sorted alphabetically is needed for another purpose, collectValues() can be used to get it.
%END REM
Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim coll as New Collection(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False, True)
Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)
Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)
Call map.collectValues(coll)
methods.signature: Public Function collectValues(targetColl As Collection) As Collection

If a list of just state names sorted alphabetically is needed for another purpose, collectValues() can be used to get it.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim coll as New Collection(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False, True)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.collectValues(coll)

methods.label: contains
methods.comment: Checks whether the Map contains a specific value.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim compar as MatchingDataTypeComparator
Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)
Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)
Print map.contains(&quot;California&quot;)          &apos; Prints True
Print map.contains(&quot;CALIFORNIA&quot;)   &apos; Prints False

%REM
The following code creates a Map of US state abbreviations and full names. If a list of only abbreviations is needed for another purpose, collectKeys() can be used to quickly get it.
%END REM
Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.add(&quot;CO&quot;,&quot;Colorado&quot;)
Call map.add(&quot;CA&quot;,&quot;California&quot;)
Print map.contains(&quot;CO&quot;)      &apos; Prints True
Print map.contains(&quot;WA&quot;)      &apos; Prints False

methods.label: filter
methods.comment: Filters a Map using a mapFilter and returns a new &quot;filtered&quot; Map.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code filters out values that are odd numbers
%END REM
Class EvenFilter as MapFilter
    Function filter(kvPair as Pair) as Boolean
        Dim value as Integer
        value = kvPair.value
        Return value Mod 2 = 0
    End Function
End Class
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim ef as New EvenFilter
Dim map2 as Map
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set map2 = map.filter(ef)
Print map2.elementCount

Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)

Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set pair = map.getAndRemoveFirstPair()
Print pair.value   &apos; Prints 1

Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)

methods.label: getNthPair
methods.comment: Returns the element at the relevant index as a key/value Pair
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim pair as Pair
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set pair = map.getNthPair(2)
Print &quot;Third pair is &quot; & pair.key & &quot;, &quot; & pair.value

methods.label: getNthValueRaw
methods.comment: Gets the value at a particular index. If no matching value is found, the return type will depend on the content defined. If the Map contains objects, the return value is Nothing. If the Map contains scalars, the return value is an empty variant.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim returnVal as Integer
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
returnVal = CInt(map.getNthElementRaw(2))
Print &quot;Value is &quot; & returnVal
methods.signature: Public Function getNthValueRaw(index As Long) As Variant

If no matching value is found, the return type will depend on the content defined. If the Map contains objects, the return value is Nothing. If the Map contains scalars, the return value is an empty variant.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.label: getValueRawByKey
methods.comment:
Gets a value from the Map for the passed key. If the Map contains objects, the return type is Nothing.
If the Map contains scalars, the return type is an empty variant.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim returnVal as Variant
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
returnVal = map.getValueRawByKey(&quot;Elem3&quot;)

If the Map contains objects, the return type is Nothing.&lt;br /&gt;If the Map contains scalars, the return type is an empty variant.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

&apos; Gets a value from the Map for the passed key. If the Map contains objects, the return type is Nothing.
If the Map contains scalars, the return type is an empty variant.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim returnVal as Variant&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)&lt;br /&gt;returnVal = map.getValueRawByKey(&quot;Elem3&quot;)

arguments.comment: Key of value to get
arguments.commenthtml: Key of value to get
arguments.inlinecomment: &apos; Key of value to get

Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)

methods.label: putAll
methods.comment: Puts all entries from a Map into this map
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim map2 as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map2.putAll(map)

methods.label: putPair
methods.comment: Puts a Pair into the Map, using key as the key and value as the Value.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim pair as New Pair(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.putPair(pair)

methods.label: removeByKey
methods.comment: Removes an element from the Map based on its key.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set map2 = map.removeByKey(&quot;Elem1&quot;)

methods.label: removeByValue
methods.comment: Removes a value or values from the Map
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim comparator as MatchingDataTypeComparator
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 2)
Call map.removeByValue(2, False, comparator)
Print map.elementCount       &apos; Prints 4
Call map.removeByValue(2, True, comparator)
Print map.elementCount       &apos; Prints 2
methods.argumentsuffix: (value As Variant, allMatches As Boolean, valueComparator As Comparator)
methods.signature: Public Function removeByValue(value As Variant, allMatches As Boolean, valueComparator As Comparator) As Boolean

methods.label: toJson
methods.comment: Converts the Map to a JsonObject. If the values are objects, the code will try to call a toJson method on the object, otherwise skip them.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim jsonObj as jsonObject
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Set jsonObj = map.toJson()
Print jsonObj.toString(false)       &apos; Prints {&quot;Elem1&quot;:1,&quot;Elem2&quot;:2,&quot;Elem3&quot;:3,&quot;Elem4&quot;:4}
methods.signature: Public Function toJson() As JsonObject
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Converts the Map to a JsonObject. If the values are objects, the code will try to call a toJson method on the object, otherwise skip them.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Converts the Map to a JsonObject. If the values are objects, the code will try to call a toJson method on the object, otherwise skip them.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim jsonObj as jsonObject&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)&lt;br /&gt;Set jsonObj = map.toJson()&lt;br /&gt;Print jsonObj.toString(false)       &apos; Prints {&quot;Elem1&quot;:1,&quot;Elem2&quot;:2,&quot;Elem3&quot;:3,&quot;Elem4&quot;:4}

methods.label: suppressErrors
methods.comment:
Suppress errors on adding or inserting elements. Errors wll still be thrown if the Map is locked
or attempting to putting an element at an index into a sorted Map.
Instead of throwing an error, e.g. for wrong content type, the method will just return false
methods.signature: Public Property Get suppressErrors As Boolean
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Suppress errors on adding or inserting elements. Errors wll still be thrown if the Map is locked&lt;br /&gt;or attempting to putting an element at an index into a sorted Map.&lt;br /&gt;Instead of throwing an error, e.g. for wrong content type, the method will just return false&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.label: clear
methods.comment: Removes all keys and values from the Map and resets whether the keyset is reversed.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;,Nothing,False)
Call map.put(&quot;Hello&quot;,&quot;World&quot;)
Print map.hasContent    &apos; Prints True
Call map.clear()
Print map.hasContent    &apos; Prints False
methods.signature: Public Sub clear()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Removes all keys and values from the Map and resets whether the keyset is reversed.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Removes all keys and values from the Map and resets whether the keyset is reversed.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Removes all keys and values from the Map and resets whether the keyset is reversed.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;,Nothing,False)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Hello&quot;,&quot;World&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Print map.hasContent    &apos; Prints True&lt;br /&gt;Call map.clear()&lt;br /&gt;Print map.hasContent    &apos; Prints False

methods.label: fromJson
methods.comment: Loads a JsonObject that contains an object of scalars into the Map
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;SCALAR&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim parser as New JsonParser()
Call parser.loadFromJson(|{&quot;firstName&quot;:&quot;John&quot;,&quot;lastName&quot;:&quot;Doe&quot;,&quot;age&quot;:42}|)
Call map.fromJson(parser.getRootObject())
methods.signature: Public Sub fromJson(jsonObj As JsonObject)
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Loads a JsonObject that contains an object of scalars into the Map&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Loads a JsonObject that contains an object of scalars into the Map
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Loads a JsonObject that contains an object of scalars into the Map
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;SCALAR&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Dim parser as New JsonParser()&lt;br /&gt;Call parser.loadFromJson(|{&quot;firstName&quot;:&quot;John&quot;,&quot;lastName&quot;:&quot;Doe&quot;,&quot;age&quot;:42}|)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.fromJson(parser.getRootObject())

arguments.label: jsonObj
arguments.comment: JsonObject to put in the map
arguments.commenthtml: JsonObject to put in the map
arguments.inlinecomment: &apos; JsonObject to put in the map

methods.label: lock
methods.comment: Locks the map, so any put, remove, replace or reverse fiunctions trigger errors. Useful when passing a Map to other functions.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code throws error 403, &quot;Map is locked&quot; on the final line
%END REM
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.lock()
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
methods.signature: Public Sub lock()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Locks the map, so any put, remove, replace or reverse fiunctions trigger errors. Useful when passing a Map to other functions.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Locks the map, so any put, remove, replace or reverse fiunctions trigger errors. Useful when passing a Map to other functions.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Locks the map, so any put, remove, replace or reverse fiunctions trigger errors. Useful when passing a Map to other functions.
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code throws error 403, &quot;Map is locked&quot; on the final line&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.lock()&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)

arguments.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Flag indicatin if the keys within the Map shall be sorted&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.label: reverse
methods.comment: Reverses the keySet colection of a Map.
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Call map.reverse()
Print map.getNthKeyRaw(0)     &apos; Prints &quot;Elem4&quot;
methods.signature: Public Sub reverse()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Reverses the keySet colection of a Map.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Reverses the keySet colection of a Map.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Reverses the keySet colection of a Map.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.reverse()&lt;br /&gt;Print map.getNthKeyRaw(0)     &apos; Prints &quot;Elem4&quot;

methods.label: transform
methods.comment: Transforms members of this Map usig a MapTransformer and adds them to the new Map passed.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code swaps key and value over
%END REM
Class SwapTransformer as MapTransformer
    Function transform(kvPair as Pair) as Pair
        Return new pair(kvPair.value, kvPair.key)
    End Function
End Class
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim map2 as New Map(&quot;STRING&quot;, Nothing, False)
Dim transformer as New SwapTransformer()
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Call map.transform(transformer, map2)
Print CStr(map2.getNthKeyRaw(0))      &apos; Prints 1
methods.signature: Public Sub transform(transformer As MapTransformer, newMap As Map)
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Transforms members of this Map usig a MapTransformer and adds them to the new Map passed.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Transforms members of this Map usig a MapTransformer and adds them to the new Map passed.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Transforms members of this Map usig a MapTransformer and adds them to the new Map passed.

methods.label: unlock
methods.comment: Unlocks the Map, so put, remove, replace and reverse functions can be used again
methods.codesample:
Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)
Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)
Call map.lock()
Try
    Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)
Catch
    If Err = 403 Then Print &quot;Map was locked&quot;
End Try
Call map.unlock()
Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)    &apos; Successful
methods.signature: Public Sub unlock()
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Unlocks the Map, so put, remove, replace and reverse functions can be used again&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Unlocks the Map, so put, remove, replace and reverse functions can be used again
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Unlocks the Map, so put, remove, replace and reverse functions can be used again
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim map as New Map(&quot;INTEGER&quot;, Nothing, False)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem1&quot;, 1)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem2&quot;, 2)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem3&quot;, 3)&lt;br /&gt;Call map.lock()&lt;br /&gt;Try&lt;br /&gt;    Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)&lt;br /&gt;Catch&lt;br /&gt;    If Err = 403 Then Print &quot;Map was locked&quot;&lt;br /&gt;End Try&lt;br /&gt;Call map.unlock()&lt;br /&gt;Call map.put(&quot;Elem4&quot;, 4)    &apos; Successful
